data.details: Check the news for interesting events or inspiration.

results.simulacra_profiles.sim_b797o8.last_obser: Perhaps something in the news will inspire you.

data.outcome_description: At 11:59 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma decided to check the news for inspiration.

data.narrative: At 11:59 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava, still in her pajamas, grabs her phone from the nightstand. Sunlight streams through the window, illuminating dust motes dancing in the air, though the view is still obscured by the closed blinds. She settles back against the pillows, ready to scroll through the morning headlines and hoping something catches her eye.

discovered_objects.name: Phone
discovered_objects.description: Ava's smartphone, resting on the nightstand.

discovered_objects.name: Nightstand
discovered_objects.description: A simple nightstand beside her bed.

discovered_objects.name: Window Blinds
discovered_objects.description: The blinds are currently closed, obscuring the view.

results.current_world_state.location_details.Kit: This appears to be a kitchen.

data.outcome_description: At 11:59 AM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma moved to the Kitchen (ID: Kitchen_01).

data.narrative: At 12:00 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava shuffles into the kitchen, the cool tile floor a stark contrast to the warmth of her bed. The cloudy day casts a soft, diffused light through the window above the sink. She glances around the familiar space, noting the clean countertops and the array of travel magnets clinging to the refrigerator. A quick assessment confirms: the kitchen, indeed, appears to be a kitchen.

discovered_objects.name: Refrigerator
discovered_objects.description: The refrigerator, adorned with travel magnets.
